tool_description: Attendance API helps you do total hours calculation based on the checkin, checkout data. 🚀
name: Working Hour Calculation
title: Working Hour Calculation

api_list.name: Calculate Hours
api_list.description: Attendance API helps you do total hours calculation based on the checkin, checkout data. 🚀
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://working-hour-calculation.p.rapidapi.com/api/calculate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "working-hour-calculation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
